Beaverton.Barbur Boulevard Transit Center:
The Barbur Boulevard Transit Center is a TriMet transit center located at 9750 SW Barbur Boulevard, near the intersection with Capitol Highway in southwest Portland, Oregon. Light rail or bus rapid transit is proposed to travel along Barbur Boulevard, with a stop at the transit center.


== Bus line connections ==
The following bus routes serve the transit center:
12 – Barbur/Sandy Boulevard
64 – Marquam Hill/Tigard
94 – Pacific Hwy/Sherwood
2X – SMART to Wilsonville
